Detailed Description

Application functions that are needed by both the Main App and the Worker.

Uses a singleton sharedAppCommon under the hood

Property Documentation

- (BOOL) hasGui [read, write, assign]

Whether or not the process has should access the window server. .

Set this as early as possible after the process launches
